alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Midland; Reagan; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 9:14PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ECTOR...SOUTHERN MIDLAND...WEST CENTRAL REAGAN...CRANE AND UPTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CST... At 913 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Monahans to 6 miles northwest of Crane to near McCamey. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Crane, McCamey, Rankin, West Odessa, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Midkiff, Crane County Airport, Upton County Airport, Skywest Airport, King Mountain, and Pleasant Farms. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 105 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
